ptolemy.domains.openmodelica.lib.omc

Class OMCLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.domains.openmodelica.lib.omc.OMCLogger

  • public class OMCLogger
extends java.lang.Object

    This class creates and stores the log file in the temporary folder.

    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Mana Mirzaei
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (cxh)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (cxh)

        public java.lang.String createDirectory()

      • getInstance

        public static OMCLogger getInstance()

        Returns:
        An OMCLogger object representing the instance value.
